Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Head and Neck Disorder/Oral Disorder/Oral Cavity Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Oral Cavity Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Dental Disorder/Odontoma/Compound Odontoma
Record.Description: A benign, slow growing, and painless hamartomatous tumor occurring in tooth-bearing areas of the jaws. It usually affects children and adolescents. It is characterized by the presence of tooth-like structures. Treatment consists of local excision. Recurrences have not been reported.
